title: Gymnastics! Fundamentals and techniques. Pt. 2
brief_description: Illustrates fundamentals and techniques through the use of close-up, slow motion and regular photography. Includes a complex Free Exercise routine; still and swinging ring events; routines on the side horse; and a horizontal or high bar series includes the fly-away, twist, giant swing, backward giant and hip turn.
